Uri.description: The StreamARN of the destination to deliver profile events to. For example, arn:aws:kinesis:region:account-id:stream/stream-name

Status.description: The status of enabling the Kinesis stream as a destination for export.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: An Event Stream resource of Amazon Connect Customer Profiles

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: The unique name of the domain.

type.description: The unique name of the domain.

properties.name: EventStreamName
properties.description: The name of the event stream.

type.description: The name of the event stream.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

type.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

attributes.description: An Event Stream resource of Amazon Connect Customer Profiles

properties.name: EventStreamArn
properties.description: A unique identifier for the event stream.

type.description: A unique identifier for the event stream.

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: The timestamp of when the export was created.

type.description: The timestamp of when the export was created.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The operational state of destination stream for export.

type.description: The operational state of destination stream for export.
